text: Sally Forrest (born Katherine Feeney; May 28, 1928 â€“ March 15, 2015), was an American movie, stage and TV actress of the 1940s and 1950s. She was known for her role in Rawhide. Forrest was born in San Diego, California. Forrest died of cancer at her home in Beverly Hills, California, aged 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American dancers Category:Actors from San Diego Category:Singers from California
title: Sally Forrest
